p: After 5 weeks of treatment, the rats were euthanized by anesthesia using the inhalant halothane. Fasting blood was collected from the heart, and then plasma was obtained. The liver tissues were removed, washed with ice‐cold saline, and then the two same regions of the liver right lobe were removed; a part was stored at −80°C until to use, and the other part was fixed at 10% buffered formalin for pathologic examination.
